todos.description: Wake up, drink water, stretch, and meditate for 15 minutes.

Make a healthy breakfast with protein and fruits.
Take a proper break for lunch and step away from the computer.
Read through the latest documentation updates for the new feature.
Spend some time reading a book before bed to relax.
